author: Iky mushtaq
comment: Nice clean and easy to use interface. However, the interval timer gives up half way through the run. Leaving me to guess on when to run and when to jog. What's the point of this app then?
Great app to get you into running for the first time.  Did my knee in when I tried running on my own, this app will get you running gradually.

author: Jon Lewis
comment: Fantastic. It lets your music play in the background, but has an audio cue so you never need to check your phone. Simple app, but has great design.

author: Johnny B
comment: There are many apps that help you with the C25K program, but this is easily the simplest and easiest to use!

author: Callie Wallie
comment: Simple and serves its purpose. Makes it so easy to get started and stick with it.

author: Amanjyot Dhillon
comment: Good App but wish had more informative interface.

author: Nigel Tufnel
comment: I absolutely love this app!  I've always had trouble running/jogging, and hated even the thought of it.  The book Born To Run had me interested in it, though.  So I kept trying and trying, always hating it.  But the way this app sets a routine is amazing.  I can jog without   collapsing now, and what's more, I even look forward to my morning run!

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Hey Nigel. Thanks so much for the awesome review. Very glad to hear it's helped you to get on track. Always here if you need us runmoreapp@gmail.com

author: Theodore Lano
comment: This is a great app to help you progress in your running ability.  Pretty simple: directs you when to run and when to walk. After repeated use, you'll find yourself building up more stamina.

author: bobbie runion
comment: Simplistic!  Exactly what I need

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Thanks for the great feedback Bobbie! All feedback welcome runmoreapp@gmail.com

author: Skyler
comment: It does its job well and doesn't clutter the app with a bunch of "features" you'll never use.

author: Max Morrissy
comment: Amazing. Never has my life been so changed by software. Motivation to run for people who have none.

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Thanks for the awesome feedback Max. That why we do what we do :) Any feedback welcome runmoreapp@gmail.com

author: Kristoff A. Robinson
comment: What I needed to start running again.

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Cheers for the great feedback Kristoff. All feedback welcome runmoreapp@gmail.com

author: Dana Hariga
comment: Simple to use, nice UI, and does exactly what it needs to.

author: Atha
comment: Helpful and has a good progression of running vs walking time.

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Thanks for the great review Atha!

author: Eren Başak
comment: Simple, easy to use, cute and working!

author: Munad Mahinoor
comment: Simple but extremely helpful

author: Héctor Gastelum
comment: Love it. Really helpful.

author: Friedel Dean
comment: The app worked perfectly on day 1. Day 2 was way off. As the timer is alot slower. 10 minutes went passed, then the counter is still saying 2 minutes left of the first 5 minute warm up walk. The running and walking timer there after was also wrong. Almost as the seconds is actually longer then it should be. Day 1 really went well and would like to use the app for training.

This is a good app for c25k training with smart watches. The phone app and smart watch app need to work together a little better. The Google Fit integration on the phone should work with the watch app so that G fit is alerted to a run when I run without my phone.  The phone app should also.let me select better my phone and watch for tracking my run.

Great app for novice runners. Easy to follow instructions, simple interface, and it can send you reminders. While small, this app does exactly what it advertises: getting you off the couch and running up to a 5K gradually.

author: Will Dickson
comment: When trying the watch only mode the timer appears to stop when the watch screen goes off, so unless you keep the screen on you never get alerted to run/walk

author: Randy Rowles
comment: Love the app, easy to use and access. Android Wear use is awesome even without mapping data from my watch. Still works and is super easy to utilize without my phone. Love it!

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Thanks for your awesome review Randy!

author: Wayne H
comment: Add GPS tracking and I'll give it 5 stars

author: David Halupka
comment: Could really use a music independent volume control

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Hey David, thanks for the feedback. Could you please provide us with more information on what you would like? runmoreapp@gmail.com

author: Steve Valasek
comment: I started using the app this week. I have a Nexus 5X with Google Fi. The first 2 times that I used it, the voice prompts stopped at the last 2 change-ups. It told me to run fine, but never told me to stop or for the cool-down. I also can't get it to work with my Fossil Q watch with Google Wear.  Everything else is great.

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Hi Steve. Thanks for the feedback. Sorry you've had issues. Which days did the bug occur on? How exactly does it error on your Fossil Q watch? Cheers (runmoreapp@gmail.com)

author: Shaun Violette
comment: Love it! I don't run but this has got me running. Having terrible connectivity on my fossil q founder on wear 2.0, can't even start a run nor does it display run info if started by my LG v20. Otherwise loving it still just would like my wear functionality back.

author: Josh Bowman
comment: Every time I have tried to use this app to do a run, it starts out working well, where the app vibrates and talks to me each time I am supposed to change what I am doing. But then it bugs out and stops talking, or stops vibrating, or stops both talking and vibrating. The app is very well designed otherwise, but this bug makes it unusable for me.

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Hi Josh, sorry you've been experiencing issues. Could you please tell us what days you have been trying and whether you have any other apps running in the background e.g. a music app. We are investigating similar reports. (runmoreapp@gmail.com)

author: David Goss
comment: Was using C25K but they don't have Android Wear support and when I emailed them to ask about it their response was essentially "meh".  Although their English wasn't that good.  Runmore gives me everything I got from C25K but my watch vibrates now so I can run without headphones.  Integrate GPS so I can get distances and I'll give 5 stars.

author: Farkas Gabor
comment: This is the worst and most ridiculous fitness app ever! It measures and displays nothing. No speed, no heart rate, no distance, no GPS position. Is this some kind of a joke? Cause I'm not laughing.

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Hey Farkas, thanks for your feedback. Apologies if we misled you. Runmore currently provides no tracking features but focuses on simply and clearly guiding you through the C25K program

author: Alexander Ramin
comment: Simple, clean interface and doesn't crash continuously like another popular free c25k app.

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Cheers Alexander! Feedback always welcome :) runmoreapp@gmail.com

author: Brandon H
comment: During week 13 the first 3 min walk is actually only set for 2:30 every time.

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Hi Brandon, really sorry that you experienced that bug. We're looking into it and will release an update ASAP.

author: Javed Hussein
comment: The best c25k app I have ever used.

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Thanks for feedback, appreciate it :) if you have any feedback feel free to reach us at runmoreapp@gmail.com

author: Rachel Opazo
comment: This app is the bestttt.!!! Strongly recommend to anyone.!! 👟👍😀

author: Cameron ar
comment: Its terrible

author: John Drevniok
comment: It's simple and effective.

author: Martin Carrière
comment: Works like a charm

author: Jimmie Scott
comment: The app is OK but it regularly disappears from my Moto 360 requiring me to resync the stupid thing. This is daily.

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Hi Jimmie, sorry to hear you have been having issues with it on wear. Could you please future explain what you mean by 'disappears from Moto 360 requiring to resync'? Happy to fix this runmoreapp@gmaip.com

title: OK app crap wear support

author: Jason Duncan
comment: Love this app. I am just getting back into running and I love that I can leave my phone behind. Just my head phones, watch and this awesome app. Hopefully by the time I am done with the 5k they will have a 10k.
title: Best App

author: Pawel Fratczak
comment: Simple, easy to use, works perfect with my moto 360,

author: Sasquatchan Bearhunter
comment: App is really good at what it does. The interface is much better Zen labs.

reply.author: Runmore
reply.content: Hi Sasquatchan thanks for informing us. We'll be fixing this in the next update

title: Simple clean interface
